inn1.comm: that's a yorker to begin with, swinging away, not sure anyone expected that first up, Hafeez tried to dig it out
low full toss on the pads but he pushes it quite tamely past mid-on
chipped in the air towards midwicket, they just kept a fielder at short midwicket and moved him  to leg gully, oh well, chance missed
and he nrealy spoons it back to the bowler! Just short of Malinga to his left, the ball seems to be coming on fairly slow
another yorker and he digs it out on the full back to the bowler
clips it straight to short midwicket, now they've put that fielder back
he bowls a half volley really wide outside the off stump, Hafeez really has to reach out to drive but he connects well and finds the cover boundary
gets this one to nip back in , he clips it down to midwicket
that was so wide outside the off stump he would needed two bats to chase that, the keeper fumbles
reaches out to drive and he squirts it past the gap between mid-off and cover
lands it outside the off stump and he leaves it alone
lands it outside off and shapes it away from the right-hander
stops on him a little bit as he stays back and taps it to the off side
swings it on the pads down the leg side and he clips it to fine leg for four, an attempted yorker gone wrong
tries another yorker and he it turns into a friendly full toss, he chops it down to cover
hits a good length outside the off stump and he safely shoulders arms to the keeper
stays right behind the line and taps it to the off side
cramps him up for room, lands it on a good length and Hafeez just taps it softly down the pitch
the slower ball this time and he softly taps it down the pitch again, seems like a slower pitch from the ;last one
shapes it across the right-hander and he safely lets it go to the keeper
this one sneaks between bat and pad, in fact nearly shaved the inside edge, the ball straightened
gets forward and pats it to the off side
fullish on off and middle and Farhat shows the full face of the bat and times that well, beats mid-off
holds the length back and he defends to the off side
driven forcefully off the front foot but he finds mid-off this time
keeps it on the off stump and he stays behind the line and defends to the off side
turns it to the on side, midwicket fields, the batsmen have been watchful with the deliveries pitched on a good length
strays towards middle and leg, he clips it behind square and the sweeper mops up
stays right behind the line and he defends
tucks him up for room outside off, he pushes it towards cover
slower delivery on the pads and he softly works it towards midwicket
good length and coming in to the right-hander, he stays back and taps it to the off side
stops on him a bit, he stays back and punches it to mid-off
sticks to the same restrictive line, Hafeez pushes it to the off side, he's willing to be patient
lands it outside off and he's happy to let it to the keeper
punches it past the bowler, mid-on has a shy at the bowler's end but the batsman was always in
that's a maiden, pushed straight towards cover

that's a really slick catch by Sangakkara! It was not a wicket-taking ball, down the leg side, meant to be flicked to fine leg, Farhat however could only glove it and Sangakkara anticipated it early, moved to his right and took it with one hand on the dive, he took it barely inches from the ground
lands it a touch wide outside off and he watchfully lets it go
yorker honing in on the pads and Fernando got excited! Looked like a thick inside edge onto the pads
close to another catch down the leg side! Younis tries  to glance it down but the late inswing saves him
stays behind the line and pats it to the off side
gets off the mark with a drive past cover, finds the gap, perhaps could have timed it a bit better
angling on the pads and he glances it down to fine leg
keeps it on a good length outside off, he pushes it softly to ooint
drives a full delivery to the on side but he turns the bat at the point of contact and hence mistimes it
he has the width to drive off the front foot but once again finds the fielder, extra cover this time
wide outside the off stump and he slaps it hard past backward point, third man gave up the chase, it's that kind of pitch in which you have to hit it hard to find the boundaries
turned to the on side
fullish in length and driven but straight to the fielder
nips back in and he tucks it down to square leg
slices it wide of backward point and he just about finds the gap
clips it away off his pads but he finds Prasanna at midwicket, he does well to dive and cut it off
angles in on the pads and he nudges it off his hip, Sanga dives and stops it
attempts the yorker on the off stump and he pushes a low full toss to mid-off
angles towards the pads and he works it towards fine leg who's quite square
the yorker length outside off and he squeezes it out towards point
Hafeez gets impatient and goes for the big hit over the bowler's head but he swishes at thin air
fullish in length and he drives to mid-off
this time he connects and how! Pitched up on middle and leg, he lofts and clears wide mid-on, once bounce and four
pushes it towards the off side, wide of mid-off and they scamper the single
taps it softly to the off side
tossed up on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
tucks it to the on side
gets across and turns it towards short fine leg
top marks for placement! Tossed up on middle and leg, premeditated sweep, he places it square and there's enough power in it to beat deep square leg, Tharanga had no chance
gets well forward and smothers the spin
tossed up very slowly, he lunges forward and defends
he prefers to stay back and defend right in front of the stumps
pushes it to short extra cover
opens the face and dabs it to short third man
tossed up on middle and leg, he tucks it to the on side
gets forward early and defends
brings up the sweep shot again, deep square leg mops up
sweeps again and Tharanga at deep square leg is called into action again
stays back and clips it down to short square leg
he commits to the sweep very early again
chips it in the air, it cleared extra cover but dropped well short of the sweeper
full on the off stump and he drives it down the ground to long-off
could have come forward as the ball was quite forward, opted to stay back and cut it down to sweeper
sweeps again and fine leg runs across to field
brings out the reverse sweep, doesn't place it well as he finds short third man
eases it down to long-on
he lunges forward and pushes it to the off side
tossed up on middle and leg, he works it down to nlong-on
waits for it and dabs it really late to short third man
chips down the track and drives straight to the bowler, good stop
rocks back and tries to cut, but the ball keeps a bit low and sneaks past the under edge
tucks it wide of midwicket
bowls it flatter and he clips it down towards deep midwicket
tossed up on middle and off, he turns it to long-on
Just when a wicket falls in Johannesburg, another one falls here! Hafeez goes for ambitious slog sweep, he doesn't get the elevation to clear long leg and Chandimal takes the catch
bowls it quicker and flatter, he tucks it towards midwicket
gets well forward and pushes it to mid-on
Misbah gets off the mark with a reverse sweep! Talk about making an early statement, the ball sneaks between Sanga's legs, not the most elegant reverse sweep though
comes well forward and defends

and Fernando yet again picks up a wicket with a first ball of a spell, soft dismissal this time, he fails to read the slower ball, comes forward too early and ends up tamely scooping it to Mendis at short cover
fullish in length outside off and he pushes it softly back to the bowler
stays beside the line and taps it to the off side
cranks up the pace and he clips it towards midwicket for a single
this time he hits the deck hard outside off and he watchfully lets it go to the keeper
bangs it in hard outside the off stump, he gets good carry though to the keeper, this pitch is certainly making the batsmen think
gets well forward and steers it to the off side
gives him width outside off, he drives but finds backward point
tossed up on middle and leg, he gets forward and defends to the on side
stays back and defends down the track
gets well forward and defends
knocks it down to long-on for a single
full and swinging in, he pushes it down towards mid-on, tries to force it through but can't find the gap
holds the length back and he stays back and defends, nippy delivery from Fernando
swings in late and he drives it firmly but finds mid-off
not convincing there, gets a leading edge towards cover, wasn;t well forward to defend that
gloved down the leg side I think, Sanga takes it off the bounce, would have been a really tough one
taps it down towards cover
tossed up outside the off stump and he defends with soft hands
comes well forward and defends again
tossed up on middle and leg and worked to the on side
decides to defend again
breaks the shackles with a four, he commits to the sweep, picks it from middle and sweeps it square down to long leg
gets well forward and tucks it to the on side
close! He lunges forward to drive but ends up scooping it towards Dilshan at short point who dives and takes it on the first bounce
mixes it up by hitting the deck hard and forcing Malik to arch back a bit to evade it
stays beside the line and taps it to the off side
reaches forward to drive but he ends up mistiming it down the pitch
bit slower off the pitch, he stays back and tucks it to the on side
lands it on that channel outside off at good pace, can't do much but leave it to the keeper
comes well forward and drives it towards mid-off
looks to drive again but mistimes it
tossed up  ever so slowly, defended again

big appeal for a lbw and the umpire Zameer Haider gives him out! Massive googly by Mendis, Malik is trapped at the crease, he tries to rock back and play but the ball zips back in and traps him in front of the stumps, Malik thinks about reviewing it and discusses it with Misbah but he walks
places it towards point and he does very well to dive to his left and stop it
fullish in length outside off and he drives straight towards mid-off
he digs it in short and forces him on the backfoot, he stays back and defends
bangs it in short again and Misbah is forced on the backfoot and is cramped for room, pushes it to the off side
gets well forward and defends

another appeal for a lbw and Haider gives him out! They go for a referral, Akmal was well forward, the ball turned back in just a touch and caught him low on the front pad, the ball was missing leg and the graphics confirmed it
gets beside the line and drives him behind point

another massive appeal! This time SL go for the referral, Haider thinks about it and says not out, Akmal goes right back at the crease and fails to pick the googly, the ball appears to hit him on the back leg in line with the leg stump, the third umpire confirms that he is gone and Haider has to reverse his decision

another googly and another referral, Afridi tries to cut, the ball pitches outside off and doesn't come back enough to hit him in line with the off stump, wasted referral there, it was far away from that off stump
he's away in a flash, full and wide outside off and he reaches out and crashes it past the gap at cover, the sweeper had no chance
yorker on middle and he whips it off his pads down to deep square leg
driven down towards mid-off, couldn't pick the gap
shuffles and clips it behind square on the on side
taps it in front of point and sets off for a quick single, Misbah is struggling to make his ground and the throw is just wide, they pick up an overthrow
stays beside the line and taps it to the off side, point picks up
comes well forward and knocks it towards midwicket
stays right back at the crease and whips him behind square on the on side
gets well forward and smothers the spin
and once again we see a batsman brave enough to go back to a Mendis googly, this time he manages to whip it down to midwicket
he squeezes it out to long-on
tossed up on middle and leg, he clips it down to deep midwicket, they take the first run quickly and that allows them to complete the second one easily
bowls it on middle and off, he gets a half stride forward and defends
stays beside the line and taps it through the gap at point
full and swinging in, perhaps tries to york Afridi but he manages to push it down to lod-on
stays at the crease and clips him to the on side
fullish in length outside off and he punches it towards cover
stays at the crease and tentatively taps it down to point
tossed up on middle and leg, he taps it to the on side
gets well forward and defends
this one straightens and he defends
strays down the leg side and he tucks it to the on side
and it's that man Afridi! Charges down the track on seeing the flight, carts hit almost on the roof over long-on, that gets the crowd off their slumber

Communication breakdown! Gets an inside edge down to fine leg, Misbah set off but Afridi wasn't interested, loads of confusion and Misbah had no option but to scamper back, he was miles out of his ground, in fact he had given up
clips it wide of mid-on and Fernando can't get under it
leaves it alone to the keeper
gets forward and places it to third man
slower ball and he turns it to the on side
pushes it down towards point
this one straightens and he taps it to the off side
gets well forward and drives through the line to long-off
stays beside the line and places it to deep point
stays back, waits for the turn and clips it to the on side
pushes it to the off side
drifts down the leg side and he works it down to fine leg, the fielder gives the chase
got himself into a tangle at the crease but he kept the ball down
stays back and clips it to the on side
gets forward and drives to the off side
clips him to the on side but finds the fielder
makes a bit of room and works it with the turn to the on side
works it to the on side but tells his partner to wait
driven firmly but well fielded by Prasanna
drops it a bit short, he rocks back and thumps it just wide of short cover
gets forward and drives straight to point
stays back and clips him down to square leg
that ball came through at snail's pace, he rocked back and had to thump it hard to get it past the infield, long-off picks it up
gets well forward and smothers the spin
bowled it down the leg side and it looked like it clipped his back, wide called
works it to the on side for a single
drives towards point and Afridi wanted a single, Sarfraz wasn't interested and there was a bit of confusion
wide down the leg side, bad ball
yet another wide down the leg side, what's Prasanna trying to do?
stays back and defends to the off side
gets forward and places it hard down to long-off
gets well forward and defends, unusual seeing Afridi restraining himself
gets down to defend again and the ball clips his pad
thumps it straight to short cover
stays back and works it wide of midwicket
picks the googly early, rocks back and punches it past the bowler
he tries to cut but the ball skids through and nearly takes the edge
the ball rolls to the on side

we have a review here, the ball lands on middle and leg and straightens, Sarfraz is a half stride forward and the ball appears to hit him in line with the stumps, the umpire gives him out but there was a doubt if there was an inside edge, Pakistan refer it, the umpire takes his time and upholds the umpire's decision
Ajmal comes well forward and defends
slips in the quicker one, he gets forward and defends
lunges well forward and defends
slides in on middle and leg, he gets well forward and defends
fullish outside off and Afridi biffs it off the front foot down to wide long-off
steers it to point and they scamper a single, the throw at the batsman's end was wide
welcome boundary, Afridi clips a fast inswinging full toss wide of short fine leg, Prasanna dives but fails to stop it, should have done a better job
the slower one and he can only dab it down to point
Ajmal tries to carve it over the off side but he's beaten for pace, nearly takes the edge
good communication, Afridi dabs it with soft hands to the off side and they set off, Sanga runs forward, gathers and has a shy at the stumps but misses
slower ball on the pads and he turns it wide of midwicket, Ajmal gets the strike
gets a half stride forward and dabs it to the off side
Perera keeps him quiet again as Ajmal pushes it towards cover and cannot find the gap
the ball nips back in and tucks him up for room, Ajmal can only defend it
opens the face and dabs him down to third man
Afridi dabs it softly just wide of the keeper, short third man picks it up, he retains the strike
full and wide and Afridi finds the gap at deep extra cover, the fielder dives and mops up, good shot though
taps it towards point for a single
he digs it in short, looked like the slow bouncer, Ajmal wasn't ready for it, left alone
the slower  ball and Ajmal squeezes out an outside edge down to third man, Fernando does really well to slide and cut it off
well played Ajmal for keeping that yorker out! Couldn't have been easy
well bowled and well played again! He's managing to dig out the yorkers, Afridi has the strike
sloppy fielding by Malinga, Fernando bowled the slow yorker on the pads, Afridi clipped it away towards short fine leg and Malinga made a mess of it
another slower ball and Afridi scoops it and the ball just drops short of midwicket, scampers the single
dabbed towards extra cover and once again there's confusion in the calling, Afridi's looking quite peeved out there
goes fo a wild swish and the ball clips the back of the bat and rolls to the off side, Ajmal wants the run but Afridi sends him back, he's quite animated out there
tries to club it past the bowler but mistimes it, not easy batting on this track!
short of a length and he defends off the backfoot
stays back and he turns it to the on side
bangs it in short and he takes his eyes off the ball as he tries to pull, nevertheless he gives the strike to Afridi
gets forward and drives this one down to point
another slower ball, he swivels and mistimes the pull to short fine leg
he's not quick enough to dig out the yorker, the ball hits his pads outside the line of leg and rolls to the off side
he does well to negotiate this yorker as he squeezes a single to mid-on
gets across and paddle sweeps, the fielder dives at short fine leg
stays back and clips it with the turn to square leg
brings up his fifty with a thumping six! What a responsible innings from Afridi, just what Pakistan needed, he made room and banged that over deep extra cover
makes room and pushes it to the off side
comes forward and defends quietly, he gives Afridi the strike importantly
fullish in length on middle and leg, he works it down to deep midwicket
that's a decent shot by Ajmal, opens the face and times the ball really well down to the sweeper on the off side
clips it towards midwicket
fullish on the pads and he clips it down to fine leg
dabs it towards point and they set off quickly
the slower ball, a bit short and Ajmal didn't  read it early enough, he hopped at the crease and the ball hit his body and dropped down
terrible fielding! Afridi goes for the straight boundary and the fielder at long-on over runs it and fails to time his dive
another boundary! He drops this short and Afridi gives the charge, makes room and thumps it down to deep extra cover
flighted on middle and he comes down the track and tonks him over wide long-on
Dropped! Afridi hoicks him over midwicket, Fernando was under it well in front of the rope but he fumbled it
makes room and cuts him down to point
thus time he dabs it past point
a touch too wide outside off, he left it alone probably expecting it to be called a wide
full and wide and he gets forward and scoops it over point
walks across the stumps and clips him down to short fine leg

That ends a superb rearguard effort by Afridi! He chased a full and wide delivery, the ball clipped the outside edge and flew to Sanga's right, he held it with one hand, Afridi was uncertain whether he hit the ball on the ground but in fact it was his bat
the slower yorker and Gul gets a leading edge to the off side
drives this one through to point
slower ball on the pads and he works it down to square leg
fullish on the pads and he works it down to deep square leg
nice straight drive by Gul but he finds mid-off
digs in the slower bouncer and Gul probably wasn't expecting it, he leaves it alone
slower ball and he clips him down to square leg
fullish and wide outside off, he reaches out and squeezes it out to deep point, third man picks up
well done Ajmal for keeping out that yorker, the ball lobbed to his pads and rolls away
hard to get these yorkers away, this time he mistimes the drive to mid-on
whips it away uppishly towards midwicket and the ball just drops short of the fielder
jams out the yorker to point and he sets off but he's sent back
stays back and softly defends this slower bouncer, Pakistan looking to play out 50 overs
keeps it straight and Gul softly defends back to the bowler
three dot balls,Gul can only chop this one down towards point, Fernando's keeping it tight
gets off the strike with a drive down to long-on
pulls this one and he gets his placement right, hits it off the middle of the bat , keeps it down and beats midwicket
the yorker consumes him, full and straight on the middle stump, Ajmal is rooted to the crease and plays all around it, on the base of the pad, plumb in front
Gul just about manages to keep out that yorker, swinging in and clipped to midwicket
Gul digs this yorker out towards long-on
yorker on the leg stump, he just about manages to get some wood on it, the ball dribbles to the on side
squeezes out another yorker, that was aiming for the middle stump
full and swinging in, he just about manages to clip it to midwicket
clips away another yorker honing in on the legstump
swings it in and he defends this one down to cover
fullish and driven on the up wide of point
he tries to carve him over long-off but doesn't time it as well, the ball drops short of the fielders
full toss on the off stump and he decides to dab it to the off side
full on the stumps and squeezed back to the bowler
places it to midwicket and decides against the single
misdirects the yorker wide down the leg side and Sanga has a bit of work to do to get a glove to it
yorker on the pads and the ball clips his boot and rolls to the off side
full and wide outside off and he slashes, gets an outside edge to third man, big cheers for the 200
the offstump is knocked out! Gul made a bit of room but was too late in getting his bat down on time, he tried to hit across the line

inn2.comm: slants it wide across the left-hander, close to a wide left alone
strays on the pads and he clips him down to fine leg, nice way to get off the mark
138.6 kph, this one had good pace and carry, kicked up a bit after pitching
leaves it alone to the keeper again, maintains a good seam position
fullish in length outside the off stump, he mistimes the drive down to mid-on
gets beside the line and he opens the face of the bat and steers him to point
starts off with a wide down the leg side, Tharanga tries to flick it down to fine leg but wasn't quick enough
strays on the pads and quite well timed, places it wide of square leg, fine leg picks it up
well timed down the ground, pushes a full delivery off the meat of the bat past the diving mid-off fielder, could have made a better effort
shapes to defend but gets an inside edge onto his pads
pitched up on the pads and Tharanga helps himself to an effortless clip over wide mid-on, nice timing, Cheema needs to keep it straight
angles it on middle and off and Tharanga tucks it to the on side
much better, on the stumps and Tharanga stays behind the line and pushes it back to the bowler
really reaches out to a wide delivery there, places it just wide of mid-off and takes a single
opens the face of the bat and steers it to Akmal at backward point
clips it in front of Afridi at mid-on and sets off really quickly, good running as it puts pressure on the fielder
lands it outside the off stump and he shoulders arms, the ball shapes away just a touch
gets across hi stumps and pushes it down towards mid-on
angles it on the pads and he works it down towards midwicket
full and clipped towards midwicket
edgy but safe because second slip was taken out, angles it across the left-hander, he pokes his bat out and edges it past first slip, races to third man

that's a sharp catch! Cheema pitches it up outside off, angles it across Tharanga, he cannot resist another slash down to third man but the ball clips the top edge of the bat and Younis Khan cups it over his head at first slip, good reflexes
Sangakkara eases off the mark with a clip down to fine leg, angled on the pads and he adjusts slightly to work it away
excellent drive off the front foot, the ball swung in late and landed on a full length, he pushed it firmly through the line down to the long-off boundary
follows it up with a thump past the covers, this was pitched up a bit, he leant forward and crashed it past extra cover
stays beside the line and taps it to the off side
strays on the pads and he softly nudges it down to fine leg
another fierce thump but it finds the fielder, extra cover was there to stop it, Gul should be careful and not give him width
lands it on a good length outside off and he safely lets it go
angles it on middle and leg and Dilshan is happy to defend it
fullish outside off and steered towards point
full length from Cheema, Sanga guides it between point and cover.
back of a length, Sanga hangs back as it nips in ever so slightly, and defends onto his pad.
goes fuller, 133 kph, and Sanga drives it nicely to mid-off.
back of a length, Sanga hangs back and defends to the off side.

edged between keeper and slip! Why on earth is Misbah economising on his slip fielders? He got away with it once when Taranga edged to Younis, but Sanga finds the gap perfectly. Length ball on middle and leg, angling away at pace, gets the edge at a nice catchable height ... There's little more the bowler can do.
Sanga covers the line now and defends to mid-off with a straight bat.
Gul tries to tuck Dilly up, but the captain skips inside the line and nudges square.
back of a length, Sanga is solidly behind it.
bad bounce for the man at cover, but what sublime timing. Slower one at 120 kph, Sanga waits patiently, stands tall and strokes it off the back foot with style.
138 kph, enough width for Sanga to cut away, but he finds point.
another slower one, 118 kph and it is full on middle and off, and Sanga punches it back to the bowler.
over-pitched outside off, Sanga flows into the drive but finds the man at cover.
typical Dilshan, plays a million-dollar shot on a pitch that can't afford it. Short, pacy and just outside off, he goes big and misses.
better, gets behind the line and defends a length ball.
angles it towards his pads and he clips it down to midwicket for a couple
gets away by giving him width, Dilshan can't resist a thrash through the off side, he finds backward point
another ungainly wham through the off side, he chops it down to extra cover, trying to hit it really hard

that's an awesome delivery, they appeal for a caught behind and Dilshan asks for a referral! The ball shapes in from outside off, draws Dilshan forward, the ball deviates before reaching the keeper and the keeper and bowler start celebrating, Dilshan wants it referred, there was the sound of a snick when seeing the replay on TV but there was no apparent deviation after it missed the bat, must have been a thin edge, the decision is upheld
steers it towards point and thinks of a single
good response from Sangakkara, he has the width outside off to work with, he hit on the up and the ball raced past backward point
keeps it closer to the off stump from over the wicket, Sanga is happy to let this go
opens the face of the bat and steers him to Umar Akmal at point
the slower ball, Sanga picks it early, gets a half stride forward and defends
angles it across the left-hander and he chops it down to short cover
shapes it towards the stumps and he defends this one back to the bowler
he really swishes at that one outside the off stump, the ball was wide and kept a bit low as well
length ball outside off and left alone
driven crisply towards mid-off and Afridi needlessly throws it to the batsman's end aiming for the stumps, they get an overthrow
flicks it towards square leg
pushes it firmly towards mid-off and mid-off cuts it off
gets a stride across his stumps and places it towards short cover
crisp square cut but he's unluck yo find the fielder at backward point, Umar Akmal being kept busy there
edgy! Tough chance for Younis at second slip, third slip would have been handy, Chandimal reaches out to a delivery shaping away and gets a thick outside edge

that's more like it! Chandimal gets forward and a defensive prod sends it past the gap between mid-off and cover and the bad news for Pakistan is Afridi has hurt himself while chasing it, while Afridi slid he removed a big chunk of the turf, his left leg is hurting because it took the weight of his body
opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man
stays back and defends to the on side
punches it down to point, stays back at his crease
slower ball  but misdirected down the leg side and wide called

there was a quarter appeal for a caught behind, short and wide and Chandimal swished at it, there was deviation before reching Sarfraz so he got excited, Chandimal didn't edge it in the end, it was pretty clear
taps it to the off side
Chandimal whip lashes a short delivery, with one hand and fortunately for him the ball lands safe, looked like he was swatting a fly with one hand
tucks him up at the crease with one that skidded through, he defends
stays back and defends with soft hands
stays back and thumps it to the off side but finds mid-off
gets well forward and defends
he's hit the timber! Something like how Dilshan got out in the third match, he moved right across his stumps to paddle him, the ball strikes the bat and then drags to the stumps
full on the pads and driven down to mid-on
gets a half stride forward and defends
starts off with a loosener down the leg side, he gently tickles it down to fine leg, the fielder slides and stops it
tossed up outside off, he gets forward and defends
gets forward and defends to the on side
tucks it to the on side and there's hesitation, Jayawardene makes his ground on time
bowls it a lot quicker, Sanga taps it to the off side
gets a lot of turn from the rough, but spins too much and it's called a wide
gets forward and drives down towards the sweeper on the off side
comes forward and defends to the on side
tossed up on middle and off, defended again
stays back and taps it to the off side
gets forward and defends with soft hands
gets forward and defends in front of middle and leg
defended again and that's a maiden
he tossed it up outside leg and too wide, he's penalised for that
fires it quicker and the ball spins a bit, he nudges it wide of leg slip
Sanga is careful against the spinners, defends
drops it a fraction short, goes back and cuts but finds point
tries to hoick that over midwicket from outside off, fails to make contact
taps it to the off side and he can't get off the strike
he shoulders arms outside off and sangakkara is being kept quiet by the spinners here
gets forward and turns it towards midwicket
well fielded by Misbah at midwicket, good commitment from the captain
turns it away with the spin to short fine leg, another dot ball
good improvisation, typical Mahela, he opens the face of the bat, waits for the turn and deftly dabs it wide of short third man
chipped in the air and just short of Misbah at midwicket! Took it on the first bounce, all happened here in Sharjah
tossed up on middle and off and defended
fired in quicker and he gets a leading edge to the off side
he oversteps! Defended back to the bowler, freehit time
Freehit Malik feeds him a full toss and Sangakkara mistimes the hoick down to midwicket, would have wanted more from that
fired it quicker and he pushed it to the off side
continues round the wicket to the right-hander, he turns it to the on side
tries to cut him but ends up chopping it on the pitch, he's still struggling against the spinners
he chips down the track but places it to midwicket along the ground
clips it with the turn towards short fine leg
stays back and punches it down the ground to long-off
pushes it to long-on
takes another single towards long-on
this one turns square, he rocks back, waits for the turn and dabs it wide of slip
lands outside off and spins away, he leaves it alone
stays back and punches it back to the bowler
makes room and cuts, Afridi is sharp at backward point
clips it to the on side
once again Sangakkara goes into defensive mode against the offspinner, Pakistan are stifling him here
lands it outside off and he defends it
fetches that from outside off and pulls to midwicket, never in control of that
comes forward and drives to the off side
lands outside leg and hits him on the pad and rolls to short fine leg, half-hearted appeal by Afridi
he didn;t pick the googly, nearly edged it to the keeper and Sarfraz knew how close that was
he edged it! Sharp one for Sarfraz, went past the stumps, the keeper and it deflects to fine leg
Ajmal continues round the wicket to the right-hander, gets well forward and defends
tucks it to the on side
what was that all about?! Sharp turn for Ajmal and the ball just sneaks past the edge before landing on Younis' palms, Younis celebrates just for fun and everyone's amused, including the umpire
stays back and punches him through the off side
pushes it to long-on
punches it towards  midwicket
gets forward and taps it to the off side
fires it wide down the leg side, he doesn't offer a shot
drives on the front foot wide of cover and Misbah gives the chase
stays back and punches him to long-on
stays back and works it towards square leg
cuts to the sweeper cover, he looks a bit more comfortable against Afridi
he watchfully lets this one go to the keeper
punched hard but well stopped at short cover
stays back but steers it straight to backward point
waits for the turn and cuts him down to the sweeper cover
he's beaten on the front foot drive and sarfraz thinks he's edged it...it was a half appeal from him. No referral. Anyway the bat it the boot, there was no edge
guilty of giving him width there, he stays right back, opens the blade and slices it wide of short third man, this partnership is now worth 40
jayawardene lost his concentration there, not short enough to pull and the ball nearly shaved the off stump, he was completely beaten
nearly punches it on the full back to Afridi
punches it to the on side
tossed up slowly and he gets forward and defends
he makes room and takes the risk of cutting really close to the stumps, he manages to steer it well wide of slip and any danger
comes forward and pushes it to the off side
drives on the front foot and just manages to beat Ajmal's dive

that's odd! It was wide down the leg side and the ball rolled to short fine leg, Haider called a wide and it appeared as if Misbah gestured that the ball clipped the batsman, then Haider cancelled the wide call!
hits Mahe;la on the pads as he tries to turn it away, they appeal for an lbw, Misbah asks if Ajmal wants a review, think that was missing leg anyway
stays back and punches it back to the bowler
stays back and punches him down to long-off
gets across and defends watchfully
stays back and deftly dabs him wide of slip
he unfurls the reverse sweep and that beats slip, third man comes across to mop up
tossed up outside off, he gets forward and defends
takes a single to mid-off, minor fumble there
tossed up very slowly outside off and he defends
terrific shot! Tossed up on middle and leg, he gets on his knee and slogs him cleanly over long leg, he knew there were no fielders there
gets well forward and defends
opens the face of the bat and angles it wide of slip
gets well forward and drives to cover
tossed up on middle and leg, he turns it to the on side
stays back and tucks it towards midwicket
he tries to cut that but the ball straightens and beats the edge
gets forward and defends to the on side
comes forward and pushes it towards long-on
pushes this one through the line to long-off
defends to the on side and Malik jogs across to field it
chips down the track and checks his shot, the ball dribbles off his pad
gets forward and turns this towards the on side
comes forward and nudges it to the on side
punched to the off side but short cover intercepts it
turns it to short fine leg
gets forward and taps it towards cover and sets off quickly
stays back and punches it towards deep cover
clips it with the turn down to deep square leg
stays back and punches it just wide of cover who dives
stays back, waits for the turn and punches it behind square on the off side
gets well forward and drives behind square on the off side
tossed up on middle and leg, he turns it with the spin to fine leg
tossed up on middle and leg, he tucks it to short fine leg
drops it a bit short, he rocks back and slaps it to deep cover
gets forward to defend, the ball lobs off the pads
tossed up on middle and leg, he sweeps and nearly finds the rope at deep square leg but the fielder manages to stop it
drops it short of a length, he hops at the crease and he tucks it to the on side and sets off
turns it to the on side, towards square leg and sets off for a single
shuffles and clips it down to midwicket
cuts back in from outside off and he dabs it down towards point
stays right back at the crease and defends with a straight bat
he drops it a bit short and Jayawardene pulls, not in full control but enough to clear midwicket
gets forward and drives down the pitch
tossed up on middle and off, he gets well forward and defends

opens the face and dabs it to short third man, sets off for a quick single, the throw to the keeper is flat and quick but not good enough as Sanga dives and makes his ground, the third umpire has a look
gets forward and drives back to the bowler
turns it down to long leg
took a while but Sangakkara has finally broken the shackles, exquisite pull past midwicket along the ground, fetched it from outside off and fractionally short
gets beside the line and chops it to the off side
angled wide across the let-hander and he gets across and cuts to sweeper cover
hits the deck hard and he rides the bounce and upper cuts it down to third man
two crisp boundaries off this over! He angles it across the left-hander, Sangakkara gets beside the line and plays a delightful cut past backward point
punches it down to sweeper cover
he turns it towards fine leg and Sangakkara has brought up his fifty, a slow one but crucial in ensuring that SL never let it slip
defends this one back to the bowler
gets well forward and drives this one down to long-off
reaches out to a wide delivery and chops it down to cover
nudges a single down to fine leg
waits for the turn and punches it through the off side
softly tucks it to the on side
Mahela attempts the reverse sweep and it doesn't come out right, he nearly chops it onto his stumps, the ball beats Younis at slip who moved to his right expecting him to hit it squarer
the ball straightens and beats the outside edge
turns it to the on side behind square and he too brings up his fifty, his 62nd!
pushes it to backward point
he chips down the track and clips him just wide of midwicket, good attempt there by the fielder
defends very close to the pads, half appeal by Sarfraz
tossed up outside off, he gets on his knee and tonks it cleanly over midwicket, one bounce and four
he's breached his defenses! But has it come too late? Sangakkara was beaten for the turn on the drive, lunged forward and the ball spun in and went past the bat-pad gap
this time he's beaten by the turn, prods forward and nearly edges it to the keeper
gets beside the line and steers it wide of point
beats him again, the doosra this time! Looks like something's going to happen
pitches outside leg and traps him on the pads, shaky shot
now what have we here? He drifts down the leg side and Mathews has a feel for it, nicks it to the keeper as he tries to nudge it own, Sarfraz knows it and so does the umpire

they've called for a referral! The doosra lands outside off, beats the forward prod, the ball just clips his pad before sneaking past the keeper, Sarfraz is confident and Misbah signals for the referral, on seeing the replays the ball appeared to shave the off stump, not convincing enough
floats it on middle and leg, he turns it to square leg
gets forward and defends to the off side
stays beside the line and tries to angle it down to third man, can't beat the infield
cuts this one to deep backward point
full outside off and driven to cover
tossed up outside off and nudged down to mid-on
pushes it back to the bowler
opens the face and dabs it to short third man
goes back and slaps it just wide of cover
nudges it down to square leg
the doosra this time and he gets forward and defends
lunges forward and pushes it softly towards cover
fires in a flat and quick offcutter, beats Mendis' cut

another one bites the dust and this time Afridi stretches his arms and legs wide in celebration, the offcutter lands on middle and traps Mendis in front of the stumps, plumb, he was expecting it to spin away
edged and past second slip! It's all happening here, another offspin, takes the thick edge and beats second slip, Misbah is frustrated, haven't seen him lose his cool like that
gets forward and defends
covers the line and defends
pushes this one towards long-on
tossed up on middle and leg, he is trapped on the pads
bowls it flat and quick and he is trapped on the pads again
he works this one down to long leg
again he quietly clips it to the on side
tries to push it past mid-off but he cannot retain the strike
comes forward and scoops this towards long-off

and it's that man again! Sharp catch by Hafeez to go with it, Afridi tosses it up outside off and Mahela cannot resist going for it, he scoops it hard and Hafeez at short cover falls forward and judges the catch well
and he's on a hat-trick! This is incredible! Tossed up quicker outside off, he drives hard and Afridi anticipates it well and moves to his left very quickly, he catches it inches off the ground
it's slow and tossed up, Malinga gets forward and defends
nearly trapped him lbw there! Looks like Malinga just about got some bat behind that, phew close call!
low full toss and he clips it away down to midwicket
tossed up outside leg, he stays back and nudges it to the on side
goes for a massive hoick and Sarfraz whips off the bails! SL looking desperate here
short and flat-batted hard down to long-on, they need to find those gaps!
tossed up outside leg and it's wide down the leg side
opens the face of the bat and dabs it past slip

and Ajmal gets it to skid through! Tossed up on middle and it just snuck through that gap between bat and pad, Malinga was at the crease and clueless, perhaps he was expecting it to turn in, plumb in front
sticks his pad out and pads it away
he just fired that flat and quick! Like a medium pacer, pushed to the off side

Afridi goes one better by taking five wickets! Perera went for the mighty slog and got a top edge, it was in the air for an hour but it was Akmal who got under it. An incredible Pakistan fightback, reminiscent from the 1990s and earlier, and quite an unbelievable collapse by SL
